summary:
Highly driven and ambitious professional with over 21 years proven experience of sourcing and procuring goods/services, directing global projects, and developing effective business processes within oil, gas, chemical, pharmaceutical, and  Marine sectors. Adept at managing budgets and cost, mitigating risks, and increasing profitability. Proficient at negotiating business deals, managing contracts, and leading/training multidimensional teams. Efficient at cultivating relationships with suppliers, customers, and staff and ensuring adherence to established best practices.
•	Procurement & Logistics. •	Category Management •	Project & Business Management •	Purchasing & Negotiations •	Budget/Cost Management•	Ship Management •	Oil/Gas/Renewables/Marine•	Chemicals/pharmaceutical •	Team Leadership & Development•	Stakeholder/Customer Relations

projects:
[{'title': 'MOHO NORD and MOHO 1BIS', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': "Aker Solutions awarded Moho contract
25 March 2013 - Aker Solutions, the international oil services provider, has received a Letter of Award from Total for the delivery of a subsea production system for the Moho Nord project in the Republic of the Congo. The contract value is approximately NOK 4.9 billion (USD 850 million).
Aker Solutions awarded Moho contract

The Moho Nord project, located approximately 75 km off the coast of the Republic of the Congo, consists of the two developments Moho Nord and Moho Bilondo 1bis. Aker Solutions and Total will run both developments as one integrated project.  

Scope of work within the contract includes the delivery of 28 vertical subsea trees including wellhead systems, 2 installation and workover control systems, 7 manifold structures, subsea control and tie-in systems. The contract also contains options related to Moho Nord which Total may exercise.

The project will utilise Aker Solutions' new vertical tree technology. The workover technology has been developed as part of the Skandi Aker/Tulip project for Total.

Management, engineering and procurement will primarily be performed at Aker Solutions' headquarters in Fornebu, Norway. The subsea trees and the workover systems will be manufactured at the Tranby manufacturing centre, outside Oslo. The production of the manifolds will be carried out at Aker Solutions' facility in Egersund on the west coast of Norway, while the facility in Aberdeen in the UK will deliver the control systems and the wellheads.

The first deliveries of the Moho subsea production system will be made in the second quarter of 2014.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ron', 'last_name': 'Böseler (He/Him)', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Procurement Manager @ Scion Instruments'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Stefan', 'last_name': 'Svensson', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Completion Lead'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Robson', 'last_name': 'Rodrigues', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Supplier Quality Manager - Subsea Global Lead at Siemens Energy'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Vidya', 'last_name': 'Akshay', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Value Driven Professional | Blogger | Life Enthusiast'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sander', 'last_name': 'Mickers', 'name': None, 'headline': 'VP Integration PMO - Proposed Subsea JV at Aker Solutions'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sandip', 'last_name': 'Jadhav', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Planning, Quality, Operations'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Irina', 'last_name': 'Vilceloiu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Procurement Lead/Energy/Supply Chain/Sourcing/Project Execution/Procurement'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Irina', 'last_name': 'Vtornikova', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Procurement Management, Project Management, Supplier Management'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Frederic', 'last_name': 'Vieille-Petit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Strategy | Business Development | Supply Chain | Operations | Ex-BCG | Agile SCRUM Master'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Trond', 'last_name': 'Ørstavik', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Think blue sky!
